team3.src.util
Class Data2MsgUtil

java.lang.Object
  team3.src.util.Data2MsgUtil

public final class Data2MsgUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for handling data chunking, converting binary data to base64 string format through the Base64 class

Author:
Joir-dan Gumbs

data2Base64

public java.lang.String data2Base64(java.lang.String inFile,
                                    int startKByte,
                                    int chunkSize,
                                    boolean verbose)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                    java.io.IOException
Responsible for grabbing chunkSize worth of converted base64 data from tempFile

Parameters:
inFile - name of the file we are grabbing data from
startKByte - where in file we grab data from
chunkSize - size (in kilobytes) we are trying to grab
Returns:
base64 string representation of our data
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file we are trying to grab data from is unavailable
java.io.IOException

base64toData

public int base64toData(java.lang.String filename,
                        java.lang.String base64Data)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
Converts base64 data to original data, and writes to file denoted by filename

Parameters:
filename - the name of the file we are writing incoming data to
base64Data - data string in base64 format
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if we are unable to seek/write data to filename
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if we are unable to find file to write to

cleanup

public void cleanup()
Removes created tempFile, and cleans up Base64 data filename and original filename.
